sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from "react" import { CartContext } from "../Context/CartContext" export function CartItem(props) { const { increaseQuantity, decreaseQuantity, removeCartItem } = useContext(CartContext) function calculateItemPrice() { return (props.quantity * props.price) / 100 } return (

{props.title}

{props.description}

quantity:

{props.quantity}

${calculateItemPrice()}

) }
